title: Community Issue Tracker
description: A role-based ASP.NET Core web application that enables residents to report community issues, authorities to manage them, and admins to verify authority accounts. Built for a hackathon with a focus on speed, usability, and clarity.

title: Employee Management System
description: A simple Employee Management System built using ASP.NET Core MVC for performing CRUD operations on employees and departments, featuring a clean Bootstrap UI and SQLite database integration.

title: Rossmann Sales Forecasting
description: An end-to-end machine learning pipeline for forecasting daily Rossmann store sales, featuring data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment through a Streamlit dashboard.

title: Titanic Survival Prediction App
description: An end-to-end machine learning web app built with Streamlit to predict Titanic passenger survival, featuring Dockerized deployment, interactive UI, and tuned ML models for accuracy.

title: Travello - Travel Website
description: A responsive travel website built with Django and MongoDB that allows users to explore destinations, plan trips, view packages, and share reviews through a modern, user-friendly interface.

title: AspNetCore To-Do App MVC
description: A classic To-Do list web application built with ASP.NET Core MVC, featuring full CRUD functionality, a responsive Bootstrap interface, and data persistence using Entity Framework Core.

title: Chronic Diseases Prediction System
description: A machine learning-based web application built with Python that predicts the likelihood of multiple chronic diseases using trained models and health data inputs through a simple interactive interface.

title: Expenses Tracker – ASP.NET Core MVC
description: A personal finance management app built with ASP.NET Core MVC and Entity Framework Core, enabling users to record, categorize, and analyze expenses with Google SSO authentication and responsive Bootstrap UI.

title: DoAnyJob – Job Finder Website
description: A user-friendly job portal designed to connect job seekers with locally available opportunities, featuring an intuitive interface for browsing, applying, and posting jobs within the community.
